column4: How do I fix this?  "tar: linux-source-2.6.20/include/linux/hil.h: Cannot open: No such file or directory" "tar: Skipping to next header"
I got it when trying to extract the source
sounds like the file is corrupt. Try downloading it again or testing it with the md5sum
nah...was a superuser problem...I had no write permission in that dir
